command_execution_error.description:
명령을 실행하는 동안 예기치 않은 오류가 발생했습니다.
자세한 내용은 관리자에게 콘솔 출력/로그를 확인 하도록 요청하십시오.

no_permission.description: 이 티켓의 제작자 및 직원이 아니므로, 회원을 추가할 수 없습니다.
no_permission.title: ❌ Insufficient permission

not_a_ticket.description: Please use this command in the ticket channel, or mention the channel.
not_a_ticket.title: ❌ 여긴 티켓 채널이 아닙니다.

empty_list.description: There are no members or roles blacklisted. Type `%sblacklist <memberOrRole>` to add a member or role to the blacklist.
empty_list.title: 📃 Blacklisted members and roles

illegal_action.description: %s is a staff member and cannot be blacklisted.
illegal_action.title: ❌ 당신은 맴버를 블랙리스트 화 시킬수 없습니다

member_added.description: <@%s> has been added to the blacklist. They will no longer be able to interact with the bot.
member_added.title: ✅ Added member to blacklist

member_removed.description: <@%s> has been removed from the blacklist. They can now use the bot again.
member_removed.title: ✅ Removed member from blacklist

role_added.description: <@&%s> has been added to the blacklist. Members with this role will no longer be able to interact with the bot.
role_added.title: ✅ Added role to blacklist

role_removed.description: <@&%s> has been removed from the blacklist. Members with this role can now use the bot again.
role_removed.title: ✅ Removed role from blacklist

confirm.description: React with ✅ to close this ticket.
confirm.description_with_archive:
You will be able to view an archived version of it after.
React with ✅ to close this ticket.
confirm.title: ❔ Are you sure?

confirmation_timeout.description: You took too long to confirm.
confirmation_timeout.title: ❌ Reaction time expired

invalid_time.description: The time period provided could not be parsed.
invalid_time.title: ❌ Invalid input

no_tickets.description: There are no tickets which have been inactive for this time period.
no_tickets.title: ❌ No tickets to close

not_a_ticket.description:
Please use this command in a ticket channel or use the ticket flag.
Type `%shelp close` for more information.
not_a_ticket.title: ❌ This isn't a ticket channel

unresolvable.description: `%s` could not be resolved to a ticket. Please provide the ticket ID/mention or number.
unresolvable.title: ❌ Error

help.description: List commands you have access to, or find out more about a command
help.name: help

list.description: The commands you have access to are listed below. For more information about a command, type `{prefix}help [command]`. To create a ticket, type `{prefix}new [topic]`.
list.title: ❔ Help

request_topic.description: Please briefly state what this ticket is about in a few words.
request_topic.title: Ticket topic

has_a_ticket.description: Please use your existing ticket (<#%s>) or close it before creating another.
has_a_ticket.title: ❌ You already have an open ticket

max_tickets.description:
Please use `%sclose` to close any unneeded tickets.

%s
max_tickets.title: ❌ You already have %d open tickets

no_categories.description: A server administrator must create at least one ticket category before a new ticket can be opened.
no_categories.title: ❌ Can't create ticket

select_category.description:
Select the category most relevant to your ticket's topic:

%s
select_category.title: 🔤 Please select the ticket category

select_category_timeout.description: You took too long to select the ticket category.
select_category_timeout.title: ❌ Reaction time expired

invalid_category.description: One or more of the specified category IDs is invalid.
invalid_category.title: ❌ Invalid category

remove.description: Remove a member from a ticket
remove.name: remove

no_member.description: Please mention the member you want to remove.
no_member.title: ❌ Unknown member

no_permission.description: You are not the creator of this ticket and you are not a staff member; you can't remove members from this ticket.
no_permission.title: ❌ Insufficient permission

not_a_ticket.description: Please use this command in the ticket channel, or mention the channel.
not_a_ticket.title: ❌ This isn't a ticket channel

global.description: Statistics about tickets across all guilds where this Discord Tickets instance is used.
global.title: 📊 Global stats

guild.description: Statistics about tickets within this guild. This data is cached for an hour.
guild.title: 📊 This server's stats

response.missing:
This tag requires the following arguments:
%s

not_a_ticket.description: This tag can only be used within a ticket channel as it uses ticket references.
not_a_ticket.title: ❌ This isn't a ticket channel

topic.description: Change the topic of the ticket
topic.name: topic

changed.description: This ticket's topic has been changed.
changed.title: ✅ Topic changed

not_a_ticket.description: Please use this command in the ticket channel you want to change the topic of.
not_a_ticket.title: ❌ This isn't a ticket channel

message_will_be_deleted_in: This message will be deleted in %d seconds

missing_permissions.description:
You do not have the permissions required to use this command:
%s

closed.description:
This ticket has been closed.
The channel will be deleted in 5 seconds.
closed.title: ✅ Ticket closed

closed_by_member.description:
This ticket has been closed by %s.
The channel will be deleted in 5 seconds.
closed_by_member.title: ✅ Ticket closed

closed_by_member_with_reason.description:
This ticket has been closed by %s: `%s`
The channel will be deleted in 5 seconds.
closed_by_member_with_reason.title: ✅ Ticket closed

closed_with_reason.description:
This ticket has been closed: `%s`
The channel will be deleted in 5 seconds.
closed_with_reason.title: ✅ Ticket closed

start.description: Hey, %s. Before this channel is deleted, would you mind completing a quick %d-question survey? React with ✅ to start, or ignore this message.
start.title: ❔ Feedback
